title: AWS Lambda Launch
overview: Amazon introduces AWS Lambda, pioneering serverless computing by allowing developers to run code without provisioning or managing servers.

title: Google Cloud Functions
overview: Google launches Cloud Functions, extending serverless computing to developers building microservices and event-driven applications.

title: Azure Functions
overview: Microsoft introduces Azure Functions, enabling event-driven execution across its cloud ecosystem and integration with enterprise services.

title: OpenFaaS
overview: OpenFaaS emerges as an open-source framework for serverless functions, helping organizations run serverless workloads on Kubernetes clusters.

title: Serverless Frameworks Mature
overview: The Serverless Framework and similar tools mature, making it easier for developers to build, deploy, and scale serverless applications across providers.

title: Serverless at the Edge
overview: Cloudflare Workers and AWS Lambda@Edge push serverless execution closer to users, enabling ultra-low latency apps.
